title: Western Dental to Stop Accepting New Patients on Denti-Cal
teaser:
Zaidee Stavely | CaliforniaReport.org

Western Dental, one of the state's largest providers of dental care to the poor said they are no longer taking DentiCal, the state program that provides dental care to low-income Californians. Western Dental says the state's reimbursement rates are too low.

More at CaliforniaReport.org.
